snippet.title: Mario Kart Wii Deluxe v8.0 / Game Showcase
snippet.description:
Mario Kart Wii Deluxe v8.0 will be released next week in Blue Edition format for all console and emulator users! Hope you like this Showcase that shows a lot of the new stuff that is coming. 

Thank you all for your great support, we hope you can enjoy the new update soon. In a short time everything will be ready. For more information you can join our groups to be aware of the updates of this project. In this showcase I'll be showing 150cc, 200cc and Battle.

Join Mario Kart Wii Deluxe groups ! :) 
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/groups/mkwiideluxe
Discord: https://discord.gg/tRVhfWSkf2
